exportData(int) - Method in class uk.ac.ucl.cs.gc01.restaurant_billing_system.database_management.OrderManager
Takes the selected orderId from the orderDetailsDataTable and queries the database to find all the information about that orderId from the joined Order_Details and Order_Items tables in the database.
